title: Common Architecture Language Model Control Requirement
description: Schema for defining control requirements within the Common Architecture Language Model.

control-id.description: The unique identifier of this control, which has the potential to be used for linking evidence

name.description: The name of the control requirement that provides contextual meaning within a given domain

description.description: A more detailed description of the control and information on what a developer needs to consider

examples.name: Access Control
examples.description: Ensure that access to sensitive information is restricted.
